game.name: Chained Sun
game.shortDescription: Chained sun is a 3d singleplayer action survival with a tiled randomly generated world. Npcs exist that can assist you on your journey following precisely in and out of combat and using their abilities when ordered. Battle, command, loot and gather!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Chained sun is a 3d singleplayer action survival with a tiled randomly generated world. Npcs exist that can assist you on your journey following precisely in and out of combat and using their abilities when ordered. Battle, command, loot and gather!
